description: SANOXY USB High Resolution Webcam Camera and Mic For PC Features: *Shows high resolution and true color images in network conference / video chat. *360 degrees rotatable base. *Image Sensor: high resolution CMOS sensor. *Digital still image resolution: 16.0 megapixel (with software boost / upscaling). *Video Resolution: 5.0 megapixel (with software boost / upscaling). *Multi-functional clamp fit for LCD / Laptop / Desktop. *Pan, Tilt. *Automatic white balance. *Color: Black. *Best choice for instant messenger programs such as Skype, MSN Messenger, Windows Live Messenger, and Yahoo Video Messenger.
title: Black 5.0 MegaPixel USB 2.0 Digital Webcam with Mic
